text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: What?! You're leaving the team?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Only temporarily, mind you. I've some urgent family matters to attend 
to.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Waaah! With you gone, who am I gonna mess with for fun?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: How about you don't mess with anybody for once?!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: It'll feel lonely with you gone…

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah… You're our ace…

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: McQueen, come back soon, okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course. I'm not done running yet. I'll be back before you know it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have come to know this team as a place where we look out for one 
another, where we are free to race toward our dreams.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please, treasure the bonds that we've forged.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And Rice…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yes?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I hope to see you pursue your own dream… of becoming a runner 
people will be glad to see win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sob. McQueeeeen!

After a heartfelt farewell, McQueen steps away from the team for a 
time.
A few months later, Rice Shower begins to struggle once again.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In front is Biwa Hayahide! And Biwa Hayahide is first across the finish 
line! The bane of McQueen, Rice Shower, comes in fifth!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: It's just loss after loss for Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
After standing in the way of Bourbon and McQueen's records, too. 
Like, c'mon, try a little harder.

There's one question on everybody's mind—where did that Rice 
Shower go?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… Phew…
Your performance on the final stretch isn't bad. How does it feel?
Your performance on the final stretch isn't bad. How does it feel?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I can catch up to the lead, and I know I'm not running out of 
stamina, but…
To be honest, the cause of her losing streak still eludes me.

Winning the spring Tenno Sho gave her a boost of confidence and 
optimism.
But her results in every race since haven't showed that.

Maybe it's still the booing getting to her, even if she doesn't realize 
it.
choice_data_list: Do you want to step away from racing for a bit?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …No, I'll keep running.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I told myself that no matter how much I lose, or how many people boo 
me, I'll still stand tall.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Besides, I need to become someone fans want to win. I promised McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'm going for another lap!
But there's no end in sight for her slump.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And next we have Rice Shower, who's been on a losing streak. Will 
she return to form in this race?

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: She's just gonna lose again.

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: I mean, she tries hard, you gotta give her that.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: Fair. Takes a lot to not give up after losing so much…

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Rice Shower finishes in sixth!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Where is Rice Shower who once stood in Mihono Bourbon and 
Mejiro McQueen's way?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Sigh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heheh… Couldn't win today either.
She forces a smile, but she's already welling up…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …No, I won't cry. If I'm going to cry, I want it to be tears of joy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: All right, back to training! C'mon, Trainer!

As she runs off, her steps seem incredibly light for one who just 
suffered a heavy loss.
What can I do to make sure her next tears are tears of joy?
